overview: Because of a bad marriage of their parents, two brothers Jules and Max made a pact never to get into a relationship with a woman. Therefore, they live a party-life in which they sleep with a different girl every day. However this changes when Jules starts to date Anna and Max falls in love with her. Can their bromance overcome this love triangle.
cast: Tim Haars|Daniël Arends|Sylvia Hoeks|Henry van Loon|Theo Maassen
